items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know how to use the washing machine.
Tom doesn\'t like women who wear too much makeup.
I have just had one of the worst days of my life.
I have quite a few friends who speak French well.
I just wish I could speak French a little better.
It would probably be cheaper to do that yourself.
I think you don\'t have enough money to buy that.
I think you know exactly what I\'m talking about.
I thought Mary said she didn\'t have a boyfriend.
Do you think Tom will like the gift I bought him?
Does anybody know if the cafeteria is still open?
Everybody knows that he likes her and vice versa.
I\'m sick of hearing the same thing all the time.
I\'m sorry I lost my temper and said rude things.
It was wise of Tom to take his umbrella with him.
It was you that was responsible for the accident.
It will be dark by the time the police come here.
It would be a good idea if you apologized to Tom.
Tom can\'t really be as rich as people say he is.
Tom can\'t remember where he buried the treasure.
